titleStmt.title: The Lord Russels farewel, vvho was beheaded for high-treason, in Lincolns-Inn-Fields' July 21st. 1683. To the tune of, Tender hearts of London city.
titleStmt.author: Dean, J. (John), fl. 1679-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, at the Golden Ball in West-smithfield.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Reason is no more our jewel ..."
Place, date of publication and publisher's name from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
